original_text: But since we left off making offerings to the queen of heaven and pouring out drink offerings to her, we have lacked everything and have been consumed by the sword and by famine.”
korean_text: 우리가 하늘의 여왕에게 분향하고 그 앞에 전제 드리던 것을 폐한 후부터는 모든 것이 궁핍하고 칼과 기근에 멸망을 당하였느니라 하며

sentences.original_text: But since we left off making offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 우리가 제사 드리는 것을 멈춘 후로

sentences.original_text: and pouring out drink offerings to her
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀에게 전제를 쏟는 것도 그쳤으니

sentences.original_text: and have been consumed by the sword and by famine.”
